text: is we did a poll on one of the live streams asking like what the average size was for GameStop. And people said like anything between like five and 10k. So I picked 10k and the plan now is to do updates on a covered strangle to show you how we can trade the equity, amplify it with options. So starting next week, I'll start sharing some updates on that. The position was established and all that it's up. So now it's time to run it, manage it and hopefully use it as a vector to help people learn not just about GameStop, but also how to use options to amplify positions, not just equity themselves, because especially something like GameStop, it's really useful, I think, and I tested it quite a lot at this point. So as always, anything you want me to take a look at, hit me up, throw it in the comments, shoot me an email, hit me up on X anything. I love taking a look at what you guys want me to talk about what you guys are interested in. It gives me a lot of focus. So thank you for sending that stuff in as you guys want me to look at stuff. Be an outlier. I'll see you all in.
